citations.narrative:
The vaccination protocol in the Program of Veterinary Care has not been followed. 48 of the adult dogs have not received
distemper and parvovirus vaccinations in the last year. The current PVC prescribes for adult dogs to receive these
vaccinations yearly. Distemper and parvovirus are contagious diseases which can cause illness, stress, and even death.
Correct by ensuring vaccination for contagious and/or deadly diseases of dogs (including rabies, distemper, and
parvovirus), in accordance with a schedule approved in the PVC, is appropriately followed by the licensee. Correct by, 23-
August-2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Facility Representative.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The vaccination protocol in the Program of Veterinary Care has not been followed. 48 of the adult dogs have not received 
distemper and parvovirus vaccinations in the last year. The current PVC prescribes for adult dogs to receive these 
vaccinations yearly. Distemper and parvovirus are contagious diseases which can cause illness, stress, and even death. 
Correct by ensuring vaccination for contagious and/or deadly diseases of dogs (including rabies, distemper, and 
parvovirus), in accordance with a schedule approved in the PVC, is appropriately followed by the licensee. Correct by, 23-
August-2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Facility Representative. 
 
 n
